name: Ludum Dare #33 - Dario Vs Bewzer
description:
Dario Vs. Bewzer is a parody made by @njinwezen for Ludum Dare #33. The theme was "You are the monster". In this game 2 players compete against each other. One controls the fearsome Bewzer and the other controls the nimble Dario.

Requirements:

-Xbox 360 controller

-Someone to play with

http://kjoebgames.com
